alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Pender; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 3:08PM EDT until July 09 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pender County in southeastern North Carolina... Bladen County in southeastern North Carolina... Southeastern Robeson County in southeastern North Carolina... Northern Columbus County in southeastern North Carolina... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 307 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ammon to near Bladenboro, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Rowan, Bladenboro, Sandyfield, Boardman, Penderlea, Point Caswell, Bladen Community College, Ammon, Butters, Council, Currie, Wards Corner, White Oak, Riegelwood, Carvers, Abbottsburg, Lisbon, Lagoon and Elkton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
